Summary: I looked up in the night sky and saw what I thought was a star
divs: Sighting DetailsI took my then girl friend to a movie and when she and I got to her house she looked for her keys so I turned to look at the stars and saw what I thought was a shooting star then it broke in too about six or eight more star like objects then they form a V shap then went in too a tight cluster by then my lady friend turned to see what I was look at when she saw it she asked what is that I had no I said I don't know and we went in the house. I called the police but they just made me feel like I was crazy so I droped it. but what I saw was real.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around January 21st 1991
